about_the_game:
Episode 1 is about Exploration, Collection and Solving puzzles, as the pace of the story increases, there is eventual introduction of Combat and increase in difficulty.

The Game is a narrative-driven linear adventure game. The game follows two worlds,

1. Campfire World :

The world where the story of the game will be narrated. Player has no control over this world. It purely serves a narrative(cinematic) purpose.

2. Story World :

The world where the games narrative takes place. This is where the gameplay will take place and this is where the player will spend most of their time.

The story of this episode focuses on our Player on a night when Chin(Player), May and Grandpa went camping to a popular place near a lake, and the series of events that take place after. After eating a pie that was offered by a presumed fellow camper, Chin is confronted with a conflict of his Grandpa and brother and all the other people in the area turning back to their wild and savage forms. The rest will entail the story of Chin and his adventure through the Lakesale(name for now for the map) to find out the reason for this tragedy and getting his family back to normal.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U (4 * 1800) or equivalent; AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 ( 2048 MB); Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent; AMD FX-8350 (8 * 4700) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 ( 2048 MB); Radeon RX 580 (8192 MB)

short_description: Embark on an enchanting narrative-driven adventure across two worlds. Explore, solve puzzles, and save your family in this mild action platformer. Vibrant visuals inspired by classic cartoons.
